# rootNode

**Type Property**

The root of the node hierarchy to be searched.

## Declaration

```swift
static let rootNode: SCNHitTestOption
```

## Discussion

The value for this key is an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode] object. Hit-testing searches only the child node hierarchy under this node. When hit-testing takes place in the screen space of an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer] object with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer/hitTest(_:options:)] method, the default value is the presented scene’s root node. When hit-testing is in a node using its [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/hitTestWithSegment(from:to:options:)], the default value is the node.

## Options

- **backFaceCulling**: An option to ignore faces not oriented toward the camera.
- **boundingBoxOnly**: An option to search for objects by bounding box only.
- **categoryBitMask**: An option to search only for objects matching a specified bitmask.
- **clipToZRange**: An option to search for objects only within the depth range of the current point of view.
- **ignoreChildNodes**: An option to ignore child nodes when searching.
- **ignoreHiddenNodes**: An option to ignore hidden nodes when searching.
- **searchMode**: An option for the number and order of hit test results to provide.
- **SCNHitTestSearchMode**: Possible values for the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNHitTestOption/searchMode] option used with hit-testing methods.
